column4: I have an eSATA expresscard that is listed in lspci, but when I plug the cable in, the drives aren't recognized. How can I find out why that is?
fyi, my eSATA isn't hot-pluggable, i have to reboot to get the drives to detect.... best of luck.  not all esata is like my experience!
Is that a limitation of the kernel? Bug or missing feature?
it's a hardware/driver issue... many esata cards aren't supported 100% :(
